website_summaries.verdict: If you want a sulfate-free shampoo by a recognizable brand that works on well on most hair types and has a reasonable price, L'Oreal EverPure is hard to beat.
pros: Effective at cleansing almost any type of hair without being too harsh
Appealing rosemary scent lingers on hair
Creamy texture produces ample lather without using too much
cons: Not quite as moisturizing as some higher-priced brands
The lid is flimsy and prone to breaking

website_summaries.verdict: If you are ready to try a sulfate-free shampoo with premium qualities at an affordable price, you'd have a difficult time finding a better option than L'Oréal's EverPure.
pros: Made by a favorite drugstore brand, this shampoo produces decent lather and has a pleasant scent
Gentle and effective for most hair types, including dry and color-treated hair
Formula is also vegan and paraben-free
cons: May leave behind a bit of residue if you use too much at once
Tube is awkward to use and its lid could be improved upon
